title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Ryen Russillo on Donovan Mitchell → Cavs, Brady Gossip, Fake Q’s on Baker
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Ryen Russillo on Donovan Mitchell → Cavs, Brady Gossip, Fake Q’s on Baker
description:
First, Fake Questions, Real Answers (3:00), including which team got the best of the Donovan Mitchell trade, the likelihood rumors of Tom Brady and Gisele fighting are true, if Baker Mayfield saying he’s going to “f— up" the Browns is a big mistake, why Russell Wilson didn't get a fully guaranteed deal like Deshaun Watson, who's clearly the NBA’s best current player, and if Trey Lance can fend off a looming Jimmy G.

Then, Ryen Russillo - Host of the Ryen Russillo Podcast - joins Colin to react to the trade sending Donovan Mitchell to the Cavs for draft picks and parts (12:00). They also discuss if Tom and Gisele’s reported marital problems should be a daily sports topic (23:00), what it would take for Belichick to retire (31:00), why Ryen hates the B1G expansion (42:00), and their favorite New England vacation spots.

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
